thread.title: REPORT: Megyn Kelly Said to Be Leaving Fox, Moving to NBC News
thread.title_full: REPORT: Megyn Kelly Said to Be Leaving Fox, Moving to NBC News

author: Lindsey Ellefson
title: REPORT: Megyn Kelly Said to Be Leaving Fox, Moving to NBC News
text:
REPORT: Megyn Kelly Said to Be Leaving Fox, Moving to NBC News by Lindsey Ellefson | 12:36 pm, January 3rd, 2017 
According to the New York Times ‘ media columnist Jim Rutenberg , Fox News Channel’s superstar Megyn Kelly is leaving for NBC. EXCLUSIVE: Megyn Kelly decides to leave Fox News for broad new role at NBC News 
The news comes after months of speculation about what her future with — or without — the company would look like. 
This is a breaking story and will be updated as details become available. 
We have reached out to Kelly’s reps for comment. 
[image: screengrab] 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
